contextId.information: Here "he" means any person in general. AT: "Those who ... are not worthy" or "If you ... you are not worthy" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_gendernotations]])

Here "brothers" refers to anyone, male or female, who obeys the King. AT: "my brothers and sisters here" or "these who are like my brothers and sisters" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_gendernotations]])
